# Recalibrate - Full Documentation for AI Systems

> Recalibrate is a comprehensive allied health platform for chronic pain, chronic illness, and health management. Built for patients, clinicians, and carers.

## Company Overview

Recalibrate is building the future of allied health technology. The platform brings together symptom tracking, pain science education, AI-powered insights, therapeutic tools, and connected care into one unified ecosystem. It serves three user types: patients managing chronic conditions, allied health clinicians (physiotherapists, occupational therapists, chiropractors, psychologists, dietitians), and carers/family members supporting loved ones.

## Products

### 1. Recalibrate App

The Recalibrate App is available on iOS, Android, and Web. It includes:

#### For Patients & Users
- **Smart Tracker**: Log pain, sleep, mood, energy, and 18+ health variables across 8 biological systems. Quick daily check-ins take under 2 minutes.
- **Analytics Dashboard**: Personal Stability Score calculated from tracked variables. Trend analysis, pattern detection, and historical data comparison. Doctor-ready reports for appointments.
- **Recalibrate Academy**: 100+ bite-sized lessons on pain science, self-management strategies, and wellness. Covers pain neuroscience education, pacing, sleep hygiene, mindfulness, CBT techniques, and more. Earn XP and badges as you learn.
- **Therapeutic Tools**: Journaling with guided prompts, goal tracking, guided exercises, CBT worksheets, mindfulness and breathing exercises, activity pacing timers.
- **Recalibrate AI**: Chat about your health data. Get personalized insights based on tracked patterns. Ask questions about pain science and management strategies. Available 24/7.
- **Medication Tracker**: Log medications, dosages, and set reminders. Track effectiveness over time.

#### For Clinicians
- **Multi-Patient Dashboard**: Track all patients' progress in real-time from one interface.
- **Doctor-Ready Reports**: Export comprehensive health data summaries for appointments and clinical use.
- **Care Team Integration**: Collaborate with other professionals in a patient's care team.
- **Research Tools**: Access aggregated, anonymized data for allied health research.

#### For Carers & Family
- **Support Dashboard**: Understand a loved one's daily health patterns at a glance.
- **Progress Visibility**: See trends and improvements over time.
- **Connected Care**: Stay in the loop with the clinical care team.

#### Pricing Plans
- **Free**: Smart Tracking (18+ variables), Analytics Dashboard, Medication tracking, Basic Reports
- **Go ($12.99/mo or $99.99/yr)**: Everything in Free + Full Academy (100+ lessons), Therapeutic Tools, Journal & Goal Tracking
- **Pro ($34.99/mo or $299.99/yr)**: Everything in Go + Recalibrate AI, Care Team Access, Advanced Courses (Most Popular)
- **Super ($59.99/mo or $599.99/yr)**: Everything in Pro + More AI Credits, More Care Team, Priority Support
- **Lifetime**: One-time purchase for permanent access to all features

### 2. Recalibrate Protocol

The Recalibrate Protocol is a standalone clinical product - an 8-system framework addressing the root biological causes of chronic pain. Based on 250+ peer-reviewed studies.

Components:
- **12-Month Protocol Maps**: Structured plans across 8 biological systems
- **8-Day Email Course**: Paced implementation guide delivered daily
- **Quick Reference Guides**: Printable PDFs for daily use
- **Research Directory**: 250+ peer-reviewed papers organized by system

URL: https://recalibratepain.app/protocol

## Blog & Educational Content

Recalibrate maintains an evidence-based blog covering chronic pain management topics:

### Published Articles

1. **Understanding Chronic Pain: The Complete Science-Based Guide**
   - Covers: What chronic pain is, the biopsychosocial model, central sensitization, evidence-based treatments, lifestyle changes
   - Key insight: Chronic pain is recognized by IASP as a disease in its own right, affecting 1.5 billion people worldwide

2. **Pain Neuroscience Education: How Your Brain Processes Pain**
   - Covers: Pain does not equal damage, how the brain creates pain, DIMs and SIMs, knowledge as medicine
   - Key insight: Pain is a protection output created by the brain, not a direct measure of tissue damage

3. **Sleep and Chronic Pain: Breaking the Vicious Cycle**
   - Covers: Sleep-pain bidirectional relationship, CBT-I as gold standard, bedroom optimization, sleep positions for pain
   - Key insight: One night of poor sleep can increase pain sensitivity by 15-25%

4. **Mindfulness and Pain Management: Evidence-Based Approaches**
   - Covers: Mindfulness definition, brain changes from practice, breath awareness, RAIN technique, body scan meditation
   - Key insight: 2017 meta-analysis found mindfulness produces moderate effects on pain intensity and large effects on quality of life

5. **Building Your Pain Management Support Team**
   - Covers: Why multidisciplinary care works, core team members, finding providers, coordinating care, self-advocacy
   - Key insight: Multidisciplinary care produces better outcomes than single-provider treatment

6. **Activity Pacing: Breaking the Boom-Bust Cycle**
   - Covers: The boom-bust pattern, what pacing is, finding your baseline, using tracking data
   - Key insight: Doing less on good days and more on bad days creates sustainable activity levels

7. **Fibromyalgia Flare Triggers and Management**
   - Covers: Common triggers (physical, emotional, lifestyle), identifying personal triggers, flare management strategies
   - Key insight: Triggers are highly individual and often have delayed effects (24-72 hours)

8. **Central Sensitization: Why Pain Persists After Healing**
   - Covers: How the nervous system becomes hypersensitive, signs of sensitization, reversibility through neuroplasticity
   - Key insight: Central sensitization is a real, measurable change in nervous system function that CAN be reversed

9. **Pain Catastrophizing: Breaking Negative Thought Patterns**
   - Covers: Three components (rumination, magnification, helplessness), how thoughts amplify pain, CBT techniques
   - Key insight: Catastrophizing accounts for up to 31% of pain severity and is modifiable

10. **Gabapentin Alternatives: Non-Medication Pain Relief**
    - Covers: Why people seek alternatives, evidence-based non-medication approaches, building a pain plan
    - Key insight: Non-pharmacological approaches can be equally or more effective than medications for chronic pain

## Free Resources

### Self-Management 101 Course
A free 8-module course covering:
1. Understanding Pain (neuroscience of chronic pain)
2. The 8 Lifelines (core pillars of self-management)
3. Pacing & Activity (break the boom-bust cycle)
4. Sleep & Recovery (optimize rest)
5. Movement & Exercise (safe, graded approaches)
6. Mind-Body Connection (thoughts, emotions & pain)
7. Building Your Team (working with healthcare providers)
8. Your Action Plan (putting it all together)

URL: https://recalibratepain.com/recalibrate101

## Conditions Supported

Recalibrate is designed for people managing:
- Chronic pain (back pain, neck pain, widespread pain)
- Fibromyalgia
- Arthritis (osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis)
- Migraines and chronic headaches
- Chronic fatigue syndrome
- Autoimmune conditions
- Complex regional pain syndrome (CRPS)
- Mental health conditions related to chronic illness
- Rehabilitation from injury or surgery
- Any condition requiring ongoing self-management

## Target Audience

### Patients & Users
People living with chronic pain, chronic illness, or complex health conditions who want to take an active role in their health management.

### Allied Health Professionals
- Physiotherapists / Physical Therapists
- Occupational Therapists
- Chiropractors
- Psychologists
- Dietitians / Nutritionists
- Pain Specialists
- Exercise Physiologists

### Carers & Family
Family members and caregivers supporting someone with a chronic condition.

## Partnership Opportunities

### Allied Health Clinics
Integrate Recalibrate into clinical practice with multi-patient dashboards, care team integration, secure data sharing, and progress reports.

### Research Collaborations
Access anonymized, aggregated health data for allied health and chronic pain research. Longitudinal datasets, multi-variable correlations, and ethical data partnerships.

### Investors
Support the growth of allied health technology and patient-centered care innovation.

## Technical Details
- Available on: Web (https://recalibratepain.app)
- Cohort 1 Launch: March 2026
- Data: Encrypted, private, user-owned
- Compliance: Industry-standard security practices
